Annual General Meeting

Presentation by David Klemperer, a 2018 Trevor Brown Bursary student, on:

â€œThe Development of Neo-Socialism in 1930â€™s Franceâ€

Our AGM will be held on Monday, June 17th 2019 at 19:00 at the Maison de la Vie Associative et Citoyenne du VIIe/VIIIe, 4 rue AmÃ©lie, 75007 Paris (nearest Metros Invalides et Tour Maubourg).

After the meeting, one of the students awarded a Trevor Brown Bursary in 2018 will give a short presentation on his project. Guests are most welcome to attend the presentation, although of course they will not be able to vote at the AGM.

We look forward to seeing you on 17th June as there will be an excellent opportunity for you to help shape the future of our Society as well as enjoying the fruits of the Trevor Brown Bursary.
